page.title: 10Education Typical day
page.content: School begins at 8.55am with registration which lasts until 9.25am. During this time the register is taken, the daily bulletin is read out and we sometimes play quiz games. We then go to our first lesson (sewing on this particular day), which lasts for two 35 minute periods-one hour and ten minutes in all. We then have a 15minute break during which we go out into the school yard. After this break we have one period of French in the language block, and then go back to our Form Room for a single lesson of English with our Form Teacher. It is then for our Dinner Break which lasts for one hour and ten minutes. During this time we may go home, or we may stay at school for our meal.
